items.sentence: Tom was dead before the ambulance could get there.
There\'s really no reason for you to go to Boston.

I have no choice but to accept what they offer me.
It would be cool if I could speak three languages.
Tom was stabbed to death by someone on the subway.

I want to keep doing this for as long as possible.
